DOC.brief_summary: This study will be comparing patient satisfaction, efficacy comparing miralax with gatorade versus Movi Prep for outpatient colonoscopy.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Patient Satisfaction of Miralax and Gatorade Versus Movi Prep
DOC.detailed_description: Study is the purpose of evaluating patient satisfaction and at the same time efficacy of the bowel regimen in cleansing the colon
DOC.criteria: outpatient colonoscopy for screening for other Gi related problems Severe CHF, CKD, less than age 18 or more than 80 years
